links.title: Instance level dashboard for primary of this cls ${ins}

styles.linkTooltip: ins level dashboard for bridge or primary ins:  ${__cell}

targets.expr: count(count(pg_repl_lsn{cls="$cls", state="streaming", ins!="$ins"} - pg_repl_replay_lsn{cls="$cls", state="streaming", ins!~"$ins"}) by (ins))
